Content:
Characters who have never been resurrected before will grant experience when they die. Disable this to effectively disable this mod.
(Default: Enabled)

If enabled, dying characters will grant xp regardless of their alignment, meaning killing a neutral character immediately will grant experience.
(Default: Disabled)

By default, if an enemy level is lower than the party's level, xp will scale to that enemy's level. If this is disabled, the level used will always be the party's highest level.
(Default: Disabled)

A number to multiply experience gain by. The average Gain value may be anywhere from 1-3. The final Gain value will be rounded to the greater whole number (ex. 1 times 0.5 will be 1, 7 times 0.5 will be 4).
(Default: 1)
